commands.name: config
commands.longDescription: Manage gamerbot server configuration. This command is only available to members with the `MANAGE_GUILD` permission.

examples.description: View the current value of the `enable-egg` option.
Enable egg reactions.

options.name: value
options.description: The value to set the option to. Leave blank to view the current value.

commands.name: dice
commands.description: Duel someone else in a game of liar's dice/swindlestones
commands.longDescription: Duel someone else in a game of liar's dice/swindlestones

commands.name: rps
commands.description: Duel a user in rock paper scissors.
commands.longDescription: Duel a user in rock paper scissors.

examples.description: Challenge @Frog to rock paper scissors.

commands.name: about
commands.longDescription: Show info about the bot.

commands.name: analytics
commands.description: View analytics for the current month.
commands.longDescription: View analytics for the current month.

commands.name: avatar
commands.longDescription: Show avatar for a user.

commands.name: servericon
commands.longDescription: Get icon for a server.

examples.description: Get icon for the current server.
Show icon for server with ID 222078108977594368.

commands.name: serverinfo
commands.longDescription: Get information about a server.

examples.description: Get information about the current server.
Show information about server with ID 222078108977594368.

commands.name: cowsay
commands.description: Make the cow say the funny
commands.longDescription: Make the cow say the funny

options.name: text
options.description: The text to make the cow say

commands.name: eggleaderboard
commands.longDescription: Show top egg olders

commands.name: lmgtfy
commands.description: Let me google that for you. (note: you need to disable adblockers on this site if it doesn't work)
commands.longDescription: Let me google that for you. (note: you need to disable adblockers on this site if it doesn't work)

commands.name: xkcd
commands.description: Returns a link to a random xkcd comic.
commands.longDescription: Returns a link to a random xkcd comic.

examples.description: Returns a link to a random xkcd comic.
Returns https://xkcd.com/123.

options.name: comic
options.description: The comic to get. If omitted, a random comic will be chosen.

commands.name: stats
commands.longDescription: Hypixel stats.

examples.description: Get Bedwars stats for ConnorLinfoot.
Get Bedwars stats for yourself, provided you have set your username/UUID with /username.
Get Bedwars Dream stats for gamerboy80, with debug info.

commands.name: username
commands.longDescription: Retrieve/modify your Minecraft username/UUID

examples.description: Set your username to ConnorLinfoot.
Get your username/UUID.
Get @Frog's username/UUID.
Clear your username/UUID.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to get the username/UUID of

commands.name: ban
commands.longDescription: Permanently ban a user from the server.

examples.description: Ban @Frog for spamming.
Ban @Frog without a reason.

commands.name: kick
commands.description: Kick a user from the server.
commands.longDescription: Kick a user from the server.

examples.description: Kick @Frog for spamming.
Kick @Frog without a reason.

commands.name: purge
commands.description: Delete the last <n> messages, or delete all messages up to a message.
commands.longDescription: Delete the last <n> messages, or delete all messages up to a message.

examples.description: Delete the last 150 messages in the current channel.
Delete every message in the current channel up to the message with ID 939727204823220225.

options.name: to
options.description: Delete messages up to this message.

commands.name: Purge to here
commands.description: Purge all messages newer than this message.
commands.longDescription: Purge all messages newer than this message.

commands.name: role
commands.longDescription: Create a role distributor that can be used to assign roles to users. A maximum of 20 roles can be used.

examples.description: Create a role distributor with two roles.

commands.name: unban
commands.longDescription: Unban a user.

examples.description: Unban @Frog given a reason.
Unban @Frog without a reason.

commands.name: apimessage
commands.longDescription: API Message

examples.description: Create a message with the content "Hello World!".
Create a message with an embed titled "Hello World!" with a description of "foo bar baz".

commands.name: character
commands.description: Show information about an ascii/unicode/whatever character.
commands.longDescription: Show information about an ascii/unicode/whatever character.

examples.description: Show information about the dog emoji.
Show information about the Chinese character Á¨ë.

options.name: character
options.description: The character to show information about.

commands.name: color
commands.longDescription: Get information about a color.

examples.description: Get information about the color #0284c7.
Get information about the color rgb(2, 132, 199).
Get information about the color hsl(200¬∞, 98.01%, 39.41%).

options.name: color
options.description: The color to get information about.

commands.name: latex
commands.longDescription: Render a TeX expression.

examples.description: Render the TeX expression that is the fraction 1/2.
Render the mass-energy equivalence formula E=mc^2, with a height of 200px.
Render the integral of a Gaussian function, as black text on a white background.

options.name: width
options.description: Width of image in pixels; defaults to none (image width set by height).

options.name: height
options.description: Height of image in pixels; defaults to 100.

options.name: color
options.description: Color of text in the rendered image; defaults to #dcddde.

options.name: background
options.description: Color of the rendered image background; defaults to transparent.

commands.name: math
commands.longDescription: Evaluate mathematical expressions.

examples.description: Evaluate `1 + 1`.
Evaluate `(2^3)^2`.

commands.name: ping
commands.longDescription: Pong!

commands.name: run
commands.longDescription: Run a snippet of code. If code is not provided in the initial command, you will be asked to provide it.

examples.description: Run `console.log("Hello World!")` in TypeScript.
Run a Python script with stdin and arguments (prompting for code).
Run a C++ program and highlight the output as JSON (prompting for code and stdin).

options.name: language
options.description: The language to run the code in.

options.name: version
options.description: The version of the language to run the code in.

options.name: code
options.description: The code to run; if not provided, you will be asked to provide it.

options.name: stdin
options.description: stdin to provide to the program; specify ask-stdin instead to be prompted for it.

options.name: args
options.description: Arguments to pass to the program, separated by spaces.

options.name: output-syntax
options.description: Syntax highlighting language for your code's output.

commands.name: time
commands.description: Show info about times and time zones around the world.
commands.longDescription: Show info about times and time zones around the world.

examples.description: Show the current epoch time, e.g. 1644165981 seconds.
Show common time zones around the world, e.g. `America/Los_Angeles`.
Show time zone info for `America/New_York`.
Show the time in `Europe/Berlin`.

options.name: world
options.description: Show times in common time zones around the world.

options.name: zoneinfo
options.description: Show info about a specific time zone.

options.name: zone
options.description: The time zone to show info about.

options.name: in
options.description: Show the time in a specific time zone.

options.name: zone
options.description: The time zone to show the time in.

commands.name: timestamp
commands.description: Show timestamp of any Discord ID.
commands.longDescription: Show timestamp of any Discord ID.

examples.description: Show the timestamp of the Discord ID 939924992345374730, which is 2022-02-06T11:46:21.137-05:00.

options.name: id
options.description: The ID to get the timestamp of.
